segments.text: I don't like this movie . It's a bomb .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , I've already paid for the tickets , so whether you like it or not we're going to finish watching it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , give me the Walkman . I'll listen to the music then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on . Give it a chance . The movie just started .
segments.speaker: S2
